item.title: ggplot2 Learning
item.description: 一个简单的例子 library(ggplot2) ggplot(mpg, aes(displ, hwy))+ geom_point(aes(color = class))+ geom_smooth(se = FALSE)+ labs(title = paste("Fuel efficiency generally decreases with engine size")) library(ggplot2) library(dplyr) library(gapminder) data <- gapminder %>% filter(year=="2007") %>% dplyr::select(-year) data %>% arrange(desc(pop)) %>% mutate(country = factor(country)) %>% ggplot(aes(x=gdpPercap, y=lifeExp, size = pop)) + geom_point(alpha=0.5) + scale_size(range = c(.1, 24), name="Population (M)") data %>% arrange(desc(pop)) %>% mutate(country = factor(country, country)) %>% ggplot(aes(x=gdpPercap, y=lifeExp, size=pop,
